show.name: The Waiting Room
show.description: "None"

show.name: Esoteric Bluegrass
show.description: "Bluegrass music for the true bluegrass fan. Includes gospel music from a local buddhist. Hosted by Nixon Kutz."

show.name: The Budgie Smugglers
show.description: "Big things come in small packages. Like that casserole at the cafeteria: you'll like it. Funky groovy electro-pop indy-blues dancesurfgrassalicous (with a country twang)!"

show.name: The Throwback Zone
show.description: "Enjoy three hours of some of the best music out there in the Throwback Zone. Join DJ Retro every Monday from 6-9 pm for some of the best music from 1976 to 1991, with genres ranging from disco and new wave to Latin freestyle and college rock...and don't worry, DJ Retro has a few surprises in store to keep things FUN!"

show.name: Monday Night Jazz Reflections
show.description: "Your source for Jazz at KTEQ since 1980, Your Old Hand Todd plays all the Jazz from ragtime to now: Bebop, Post-bop, vocalists, Big Band, Third Stream, Fusion. . .even some Western Swing. With a theme every week to musically riff on, we'll get your through the late hours of your Monday with happy ears."

show.name: The Jambulance
show.description: "Playing all the best tracks freshly plucked from the music tree. A combination of Jon and Julian's clever wits, and sharp cuts make for an electric experience that will be fondly regarded in the music theory textbooks of the future."

show.name: Twisted Love
show.description: "Indie and Alternative."

show.name: After School Special
show.description: "PUNK ROCK"

show.name: Pop Culture Academy
show.description: "With host King Adkins. Examining all things pop culture with an academic slant."

show.name: The Recovery
show.description: "Capitan Carl brings 3 hours of Carribean Cool with a collection of Ska from every wave, reggae, and dancehall. SALSA OPTIONAL BUT RECOMMENDED."

show.name: Purple Sweet Potato
show.description: "An adventure into the musical abyss!"

show.name: Left of the Dial
show.description: "Punk, Doom, Metal, Real Country, Alternative, Whatever moves us at the time... plus requests!"

show.name: House of Funk
show.description: "DJ TKO's EDM mix of house, dubstep, trap, and various electronic delights."

show.name: Deep Wave
show.description: "Dive in and get wet. Spend some time by the water and get sand in your crack with Brynn on Deep Wave."

show.name: Ckaos
show.description: "Ever wished you could have less control in your life? Wish no more! Ckaos is perfectly designed to make your Friday mornings unpredictable with our unorthodox music selection methods and synergized comedy segments (if the gremlins would stop breaking into the studio, that is)."

show.name: Bear Bacon
show.description: "weekly radio show Fridays from 12 to 3 MST hosted by @noimjory at KTEQ 91.3 in Rapid City, SD. Working hard to get exposure for lesser known artists and the music we love!"

show.name: Skeletons Out Of The Closet
show.description: "Queer Horror Punk and Combinations of Those Words!"

show.name: The B-Side
show.description: "A little bit of everything from everywhere. Tune in to listen to tracks you might not have heard from your favorite artists or discover something new! Let the Hipster take you through a musical journey."

show.name: Broken Record
show.description: "Variety and Talk Radio."

show.name: The Benny Griffith Show
show.description: "None"

show.name: Janitors of the Apocolypse
show.description: "Destiny's powerful hand has made the bed of my future, and it's up to me to lie in it. I am destined to be a radio DJ. To right wrongs, to play great, somewhat obscure songs that haven’t received a chance to be heard, and to pound two-fisted power pop into the ears of listeners everywhere. And you don't fight destiny. No sir. And, you don't eat crackers in the bed of your future, or you get all... scratchy, like an old vinyl record."

show.name: Houston We Have A Problem
show.description: "None"

show.name: Under the Tundra with Jason Ader
show.description: "Broadcasting from Beneath Rapid City's Cultural Permafrost. Playing a mix of Rock, Punk, Hardcore, Metal, Post-Rock, Post-Punk, Post-Hardcore, Post-Metal, New-Wave, No-Wave, Power-Pop, Noise-Rock, Stoner, Sludge, Doom, Thrash, Psych-Rock, Space-Rock, Shoegaze, Prog, and Avant-Garde."

show.name: Prayers to the Transparent Kaleidoscope
show.description: "Mostly obscure albums, compilations, singles, and anything else that makes your head bob."

show.name: Wild Woman Radio
show.description: "Music by Female Artists and Female Song Writers featuring Wild Woman Wisdom. Guest appearances by local Wild Women who live life on their own terms, Yogic Wisdom, and lots of beautiful music. The fearless pursuit of what sets our souls on fire."

show.name: Bro Jam
show.description: "Electronica and eSports!"

show.name: The Rough Draft
show.description: "If you enjoy listening to two kids talk about anything from inherent human emotion and actions to jazz and movies, tune into The Rough Draft with Eda and Caitlyn! You never know what you'll get, which is like an exciting grab-bag half filled with poison and barbed wire. Enjoy!"

show.name: The Sparrow
show.description: "Topical talk and vintage vinyl. The Sparrow show on KTEQ combines great music with talking about some things that seem important. Join The Sparrow and his Chautauqua every Sunday night."
